top-bar.text-before: Hello! It is a tracker of eco habits. Please
top-bar.text-after: if you are already with us.

header.caption: A new way to cultivate useful habits
header.content: People in Ukraine use an average of 500 disposable bags and 70 paper cups per year. It is as easy as bringing your own eco-bag and cup to save the lives of three dolphins or one turtle and keep the oceans clean for the next generation.

stats.bag-question: And how many packages did you not take today?
stats.cup-question: And how many cups did you not throw away today?
stats.cup-link: places that make a discount on a drink in your cup

welcome.description: GreenCity - a platform to develop and maintain sustainable habits for eco-friendly living. The application is available in web and mobile versions.
welcome.keywords: best task planner, event planner, project planner, task scheduler, the best task planner, eco planner, task tracker, to do planner, eco tips, useful habits, sustainable eco habits, daily eco habits, habits for every day, eco products, live green
welcome.title: Home

map.keywords: Find information about local establishments, view maps, and get directions on Google Maps.
map.title: Map

about.description: The mission of the GreenCity app. The purpose of the project.
about.keywords: eco products, eco lifestyle, eco habits
about.title: About us

news.description: Eco News. All the latest events about ecology.
news.keywords: eco news, ecological events, ecology news, trainings
news.title: Eco news

about-us.disabled-link: The page is in the process of developing

block-1.text: GreenCity project addresses the challenge of significant changes in behaviors and lifestyles of Lviv citizens

block-2.text: Is to help people get sustainable eco habits in an easy and fun way and gain support of the like-minded people.

block-1.header: I don’t have time to look for eco stores
block-1.text: We will help you to find eco places near your homes and offices. And we will tell you about discounts.

block-3.text: With us, you will find like-minded people with whom you can easily share purchases (wholesale).

block-4.header: I can do nothing to change the situation
block-4.text: You may get inspired with stories of other people who gained eco habits and changed their lives.

block-5.header: I don’t feel support from family and society
block-5.text: With our help, you will find this support in our community.

post-news-loader.text-2: Your news is loading to website. Please wait until page refreshes.

create-news.form-description: Please provide as many details as you can - place and time of the event, the goal of gathering, etc. You can come back and update news anytime after publishing.
create-news.source-tooltip-1: Please add the link of original article/news/post.
create-news.content-placeholder: e.g. Short description of news, agenda for event
